metadata.title: CVE-2017-20147 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In the ebuild package through smokeping-2.7.3-r1 for SmokePing on Gentoo,the initscript uses a PID file that is writable by the smokeping user. Bywriting arbitrary PIDs to that file, the smokeping user can cause a denialof service to arbitrary PIDs when the service is stopped.

criterions.comment: smokeping package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
